Package gov.nih.nlm.meme.server

Provides all classes for the MEME application server and its services.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
MEMEApplicationService Generically represents an application service.
MEMERequestListener Generically represents a socket server that listens for application server requests.
ServerConstants This interface holds constants commonly used by the MEME server.
ServerThread Generically represents an initializable server component that will run in its own thread.
 

Class Summary
ActionSequences Used to perform action sequences for testing/debugging purposes.
ActionService Handles requests to perform molecular actions.
ActivityMonitor Used to generate graphs of editing performance.
AdminService Handles requests for administrative tasks.
AuxiliaryDataService Handles requests for auxiliary data.
CGIShutdownServer Used to shutdown server (DO NOT USE).
ConceptMappingService Handles requests related to concept mappings.
ContentViewService Handles requests related to ContentViews.
CoreDataService Handles requests for core data.
DummyService Used for debugging (DO NOT USE).
FinderService Handles requests for finding data.
HTTPRequestListener Simple HTTP socket server implementation.
MaintenanceService Handles maintenance requests.
MappingService Handles requests related to map sets or mappings.
MEMEApplicationServer The application entry point.
MEMERelaEditorService This class services requests for the MEMERelaEditorKit.
MergeEngineService Handles requests related to merge sets.
MIDDataSourcePool Represents a pool of database connections.
PoolStatistics Tracks of the current detail value of thread pool.
ReportsGenerator Handles requests for various kinds of reports.
ServerToolkit Utility class for the MEME Application Server.
SessionContext Container for all the session information.
SessionTimeoutThread Manages timing out of sessions.
Statistics Server statistics.
ThreadPool Represents a pool of threads.
Version The Version class provides package version information for gov.nih.nlm.meme.server package.
WorklistService Handles requests relating to worklists or checklists.
 

Package gov.nih.nlm.meme.server Description

Provides all classes for the MEME application server and its services.
